div.div: Building leaders through innovation, excellence, and diversity

img.data-caption: Through the Bluegrass Aerospace Experience, Bardstown High School students will be building an airplane from start to finish and learning about aviation.
img.alt: Through the Bluegrass Aerospace Experience, Bardstown High School students will be building an airplane from start to finish and learning about aviation.

br.span: Pre-Registration for the 2020-2021 school year will open Friday, April 24, 2020 at 8AM online at tigerslead.com/bcspreschool.

div.a: Board of Education approves ending the 2019-20 school year on May 20.

br.span: As you know Governor Beshear has requested all Kentucky schools remain closed to in-person instruction for the remainder of this school year. With that in mind, on Tuesday the Bardstown City Schools Board of Education unanimously voted and approved to make our last day of non-traditional instruction Wednesday, May 20.

div.a: BCS will not return for in-person instruction or activities the remainder of this school year

br.span: Per recommendation from Governor Beshear, Bardstown City Schools will not return for in-person instruction or activities the remainder of this school year.
